title: Hedsor House launches HOUSE LAUNCHES ‘‘Head Start At Hedsor’ packages for groups
text:
Hedsor House launches HOUSE LAUNCHES ‘‘Head Start At Hedsor’ packages for groups Hedsor House launches HOUSE LAUNCHES ‘‘Head Start At Hedsor’ packages for groups Details Category: Venues & Events   10:50 Exclusively for the first two months of 2016, Hedsor House will launch midweek ‘Head Start At Hedsor’ packages for corporate groups searching for a unique board retreat, an out-of-the-ordinary conference or a day of inspirational team building exercises. Equally suitable for a peaceful or lively getaway for a group of friends resolving to simply have more fun together in 2016, the house provides the idyllic setting for both making and breaking New Year’s resolutions. 
Only 45 minutes from central London and 15 miles from London Heathrow Airport, Hedsor is a whole world away from the bustle of the city. Thanks to its diverse events spaces, its brand new bedrooms and the 100 acres of surrounding historic parkland, Hedsor is able to offer an unforgettable one of a kind experience. Team Activities In A Veritable Playground: Ensure 2016 goes off with a bang with a rewarding team experiences. Country pursuits are plentiful: Guests can try their hand at cannon ball firing on the sweeping lawns or take on a treasure hunt in the ‘Oaken Grove’, allowing a great opportunity for company staff to get to know each other better, especially consultants and freelancers who work remotely or part-time. Orienteering, clay pigeon shooting, archery, fishing or quad bike riding can be coordinated, and for thrill seekers the ground’s 4x4 track is the ultimate adrenaline-filled experience. Personal trainers are available for private or group military fitness sessions in the grounds, setting you up with the best intentions for turning over that new leaf. If the weather is not playing ball, energy-boosting indoor workouts can be booked including Yoga, Pilates and Tai Chi, leaving participants feeling strong, sculpted and totally revitalised. For those wishing to make rather than break resolutions watercolour-painting classes, taught by a local artist, take place in the house’s Boudoir room. Wine, port and cheese tastings as well as film-making classes can be booked too, enabling guests to learn a new skill and expand their knowledge during their visit. Working with a number of recommended partners, Hedsor is able to deliver any number of desired team activities, however weird and wonderful! Clients are guaranteed two important things - privacy and freedom, and are not shackled by any outside influences. Sharpen Your Pencils, Back To Your Desks: With endless views of the glorious Buckinghamshire countryside from all the house’s spacious meeting rooms, going back to the grind won’t seem so tough and inspiration will flow both during and after a visit to Hedsor. With eight rooms of various styles and sizes, covering 534 sq. m of ground floor space available, Hedsor provides an environment free from distraction. Versatile and flexible spaces include the stunning Ballroom which seats up to 50 boardroom style and 180 theatre style, and the panelled Library, ideal for more intimate meetings, seating 12. Be Soaked, Rubbed And Scrubbed: After an action-packed day guests can retreat to the house’s eleven newly renovated bedrooms, lovingly restored to reflect the house’s period features. Offering a sanctuary of peace to completely unwind, a selection of in-room beauty treatments including NATURA BISSÉ facials and Aromatherapy Associates massages are available from Perfect 10, the acclaimed mobile beauty service, to deliver the ultimate relaxation. Getting The Party Started: Finally, guests can then enjoy a leisurely dinner in the privacy of their own Georgian house for the night. Behind closed doors anything is possible, and clients are given an extensive choice of imaginative foodie experiences. Hedsor works with renowned caterers including By Word of Mouth, Admirable Crichton, Rocket and Rhubarb. Mandarin Oriental, Jewish culinary expert Philip Small, the Melissa Webb and many more work with the team to offer a diverse range of gastronomic expertise. To ensure they are in line with Hedsor’s own values, partners are selected not only on the basis of excellence, but for their flair, sense of fun and creativity. The ‘Head Start At Hedsor’ package costs from £5,000 + VAT for midweek bookings during January and February 2016. Accommodation is included. Beauty treatments, activities and catering incur an additional charge and will be priced up according to your personal requirements. Related articles
